message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Could you consider that?
Thanks for the offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $95. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $92?

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $97. It's a great value, and I think you'll be happy with the purchase!
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $94?

I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $99. It's my final offer, and I think it's a great deal for both of us!
